__inputs.name: VAR_CW_COMPANY_ID
__inputs.label: Your MSP's company ID as it is in ConnectWise Manage

__inputs.name: VAR_RANDOM_DELAY
__inputs.label: Random delay, between zero and $random_delay seconds

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT count(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 0
  AND [Board_Name] LIKE 'Support'
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 1
  AND ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support' OR [Board_Name] LIKE 'Triage')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Date_Closed_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 0
  AND [Board_Name] LIKE 'Triage'
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 0
  AND [Board_Name] LIKE 'Support'
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND ResourceList IS NULL

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 0
  AND [Board_Name] LIKE 'Support'
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [SR_Urgency_Name] LIKE 'Priority 0 - MSP'
  AND [IsInSLA] = 0

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT count(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 0
  AND ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support' OR [Board_Name] LIKE 'Triage')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Last_Update_UTC] < GETUTCDATE() - 3
  AND [Status_Name] NOT LIKE 'Awaiting Hardware'
  AND [Status_Name] NOT LIKE 'Awaiting Onsite'
  AND [Status_Name] NOT LIKE 'Scheduled'

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 1
  AND ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Date_Entered_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT
      [Closed_By], 
      COUNT(*) as 'Closed last 24 hrs'
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE [Closed_Flag] = 1
  AND ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support' OR [Board_Name] LIKE 'Alerts')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Date_Closed_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5
  AND [Hours_Actual] > 0
  GROUP BY [Closed_By]
  ORDER BY 'Closed last 24 hrs' DESC

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT Member_Name, SUM([Hours_Actual]) as 'Sum_Hours_Actual'
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_time_entry]
  WHERE [Time_Start] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5
  AND [Time_End] < GETUTCDATE() + 0.5
  GROUP BY [Member_Name]
  ORDER BY 'Sum_Hours_Actual' DESC

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT CAST([Date_Entered_UTC] as DATE) as time, ISNULL(count([SR_Service_RecID]), 0) as 'Opened Tickets'
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support' OR [Board_Name] LIKE 'Triage')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Entered_By] NOT LIKE 'Automate'
  AND [Date_Entered_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 14
  GROUP BY CAST([Date_Entered_UTC] as DATE)
  ORDER BY time

DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT $__timeGroup([Date_Closed_UTC], '1d',0) as time, ISNULL(count([SR_Service_RecID]), 0) as 'Closed Tickets'
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support' OR [Board_Name] LIKE 'Triage')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Closed_By] NOT LIKE 'Automate'
  AND [Date_Closed_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 14
  GROUP BY $__timeGroup([Date_Closed_UTC], '1d',0)
  ORDER BY $__timeGroup([Date_Closed_UTC], '1d',0)

panels.description: Hours logged on this week's timesheet

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT [Member_Name],
        [TS_Hours]
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_time_sheet]
  WHERE [Date_End] < GETDATE() + 7
  AND [Date_Start] > GETDATE() - 7
  ORDER BY [TS_Hours] DESC

panels.title: Hours logged this week

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @RandomDelay int = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % ($random_delay-1))
WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT
      [SR_Type_Name], 
      COUNT(*) as 'Ticket Types last 7 days'
  FROM [$cw_db_name].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
  WHERE ([Board_Name] LIKE 'Support')
  AND [parentTicketId] IS NULL
  AND [Date_Entered_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 7
  AND [Closed_By] NOT LIKE 'Automate'
  GROUP BY [SR_Type_Name]
  ORDER BY 'Ticket Types last 7 days' DESC

list.label: Your MSP's company ID as it is in ConnectWise Manage
list.name: cw_company_id

list.label: Random delay, between zero and $random_delay seconds
